title: error upgrading from 5.0.13 to 6.0.0a
body:
just tried an upgrade from 5.0.13 to 6.0.0a and experienced the following error:

an exception occurred while executing 'alter table `oc_filecache` add `storage_mtime` int default 0 not null, change path_hash `path_hash` varchar(32) default '' not null, change etag `etag` varchar(40) default null': sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 1005 can't create table 'owncloud.#sql-3eb5_4e9967' (errno: 136)

my environment is sitting on top of clustered mysql, not sure if that is playing a role in this upgrade.  can someone point me to where the sql commands issued during an upgrade are coming from?  i can't seem to find anything in the 6.0.0a source directory that matches this execution statement.

thanks!

mark
